CHAT.comment: GOODYEAR DUNLOP TIRES OPERATIONS, S.A., ET AL., Petitioners v. EDGAR D. BROWN, ET UX., CO-ADMINISTRATORS OF THE ESTATE OFJULIAN DAVID BROWN, ET AL.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:15 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MEIR FEDER ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF BENJAMIN J. HORWICH, ON BEHALF OF THE UNITED STATES, AS AMICUS CURIAE, SUPPORTING PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF COLLYN PEDDIE ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF MEIR FEDER ON BEHALF OF PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 12:16 p.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
